stage_description:
In this stage you will be importing and configuring all the data required for your analysis session. Specifically, you will:
  • Locate the folder containing your sample and standards data
  • Select or create a configuration
  • Specify your SRM file identifier
  • Specify your file extension

Once specified, graph your sample and standard data by clicking APPLY.
find_data_description: <qt/>File path to the directory containing the data files.
config_description: <qt/>The name of the LAtools configuration you want to use to import the data.
srm_description: <qt/>This is used to identify SRM measurements in your data file, and should be present in the file names of all analyses containing SRMs.
file_extension_description: <qt/>This is used to identify data files in the analysis directory. All files in the directory with this extension will be imported.
general_error_description:
An error occurred while attempting to load the data files. 
 Please check that the specified data folder contains the correct data files
